name: Dillon Mears
text: I love Domino's. This location does an amazing job of preparing food quickly and well. Have ordered pick up multiple times and have never had a problem. Best Domino's Pizza in the county! This company and store go out of their way to make the process more safe during Covid-19.

name: Kyle Perry
text: Prompt friendly service.  Waitress offered napkins and plates.  Pizza was baked on time for me to drive and pick up.  Pizza isn't the best tasting in the county but service is great.   Pizza 4/5. Service 5/5.  Overall 4.5/5

name: Lisa Schlosser
text: Dan was my first contact for my order. He was Awesome. Fixed the incorrect address, and helped me with my order. I was amazed that only 20 minutes later, he was my delivery driver. Kudos to Dan.... Great customer service and the food was excellent!!! Thank you Dan üòä

name: JenJen_moonlight
text: The dominos pizza in union, ky has so many problems getting orders right. The dominos pizza in dry ridge, ky and richwood, ky is the best one's I have ever eaten at! Don't waste your time in Union!

name: Brian Mckee
